title: Learning Unix for OS X Mountain Lion 2012
description:
Book Description

Think your Mac is powerful now? Author Dave Taylor shows you how to get much more from your system by tapping into Unix, the robust operating system concealed beneath OS XÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s beautiful user interface. Mountain Lion puts more than a thousand Unix commands at your fingertipsÃ¢â‚¬â€for finding and managing files, remotely accessing your Mac from other computers, and using a variety of freely downloadable open source applications. Take a friendly tour of the Unix command line and 50 of the most useful utilities, and quickly learn how to gain real control over your Mac.
